transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji. Sir aapka jo registered mail ID hamare paas hai that is priyanshu.rawal17@gmail.com.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Sahi hai sir?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Ek baar open karenge sir ye wala mail ID apna?
Customer: Haan sir.
Customer: Open kar diya.
Executive: Sir abhi just aapke paas ek mail aaya hoga, Ritika IndiaMART se.
Customer: Nahi aaya.
Executive: Sir ek baar refresh kariye.
Customer: Haan aa gaya.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir phone se join karenge ya system se?
Customer: System se.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir mic aur camera hai dono mein?
Customer: Haan hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Mic ki need hai camera toh nahi bhi hoga it's okay.
Executive: Sir maine join kar liya hai.
Customer: Haanji?
Executive: Maine join kar liya hai sir.
Customer: Ye call dena mail ID, secondary.
Customer: Pehle mail ID daal rakhi hai.
Customer: Haan ab ek aur secondary mail ID daal rakhi hai na maine Ishita wali?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Uspe send kar dijiye na ye.
Executive: Sir uspe bhi gaya hoga. Aap ek baar check kariye.
Customer: Uspe nahi aaya. Woh toh open hi nahi hai mere system pe.
Executive: Dobara check kar lete hai ek baar.
Executive: Sir ek pe gaya Priyanshu wali pe.
Customer: Ab ek second aapko call pe rehna padega. Main pehle isko woh karna padega mere ko cancel fir main dobara se ek baar woh bhejti hu. Ek second hai na. Call pe rahiye.
Executive: Ye wala mail ID nahi hai hamare paas?
Customer: Kaunsa?
Executive: Priyanshu wala.
Customer: Ye uske andar login nahi hai sir. Ya toh main login kar deta hu unko.
Executive: Koi baat nahi, koi baat nahi. Maine kar diya ab toh cancel. Main uspe bhej deti hu. Koi itna bada issue nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Dusra sir mail ID jo mujhe aapka show ho raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Woh yaha par hai.
Executive: Sir ye aise likha hai 25.ishita@
Customer: Haanji haanji yahi hai.
Executive: 25. Ishita
Executive: @gmail.com.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Sir ek baar check kariye aaya?
Customer: Ek second. Refresh karna.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Haanji aa gaya.
Executive: Join karenge sir.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Sir join kiya?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji.
Executive: Sir ek baar apna screen share kar lijiye. Aapko aata hai toh theek hai nahi toh main guide kar deti hu.
Customer: Haan no problem. Main call disconnect kar rahi hu. Aap sir ek baar apna screen share kar lenge bas?
Customer: Haanji haanji karta hu.
Customer: Screen share kar raha hu.
Executive: Sir mera voice aa raha hai na aapko?
Customer: Haanji haanji. Call aa raha hai par voice nahi aa raha.
Executive: System pe aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi. Aa raha hai. Abhi theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join the session.

Resolution:

- Executive resent the meeting link to customer.

- Executive guided customer to share screen.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- screen sharing, meeting link, verification
